document.full_text: iraq's shi'ite prime minister, nuri al-maliki, said on friday military intervention by sunni arab neighbors in bahrain could spark a sectarian war in the region and must end.
document.title: iraq's maliki says bahrain may ignite sectarian war
lines_and_colors: iraq's shi'ite prime minister, nuri al-maliki, said on friday military intervention by sunni arab neighbors in bahrain could spark a sectarian war in the region and must end.
